This role is 80 – 100K+ skills dependant; Java/J2EE lots of business savvy! Richmond HIll location

The Software Developer will be working on ERP (developed in-house) applications for the Commercial Real Estate industry. The applications are for new business processes  yet to implement, so there is some creativity and business scoping required.  The developer will have the opportunity to learn many core elements of business, including Financials (payroll), Purchasing, Maintenance, Sales and Marketing, Customer services, Human Resources.
The right candidate must possess the following:
•        Must have the interest and capability to move to greater degrees of responsibility and leadership.

•        Must be eager to learn:  the existing members of the team are high-end experienced developers who can impart a lot of knowledge and skill to this person.

•        Must be business-minded. The candidate will need to be able to understand a business context and build effectively for it, taking into account all the stakeholders and the business intent of the application. Moreover, the candidate should have a strong interest in business. Our client wants someone who gets satisfaction out of solving business problems, rather than being purely technology focused.  

•        Must be good at interfacing with others in development of applications.

•        Must be willing to do maintenance work where required (i.e; sometimes the need of the hour is to help out with an operational problem rather than forging ahead on a new application.

•Must be flexible in term of hours. Sometimes, an upgrade or enhancement will need to be put in at night or on a weekend. Candidate should be willing to entertain this.  

•Must be willing to work independently in a non-political team environment.

•Must be, ambitious, visionary, forward thinking, business minded, and natively curious about what-if possibilities.


•Must be degreed, Computer Science or Business,

Environment : Java, J2EE, AJAX, TomCat, OpenSource tools, SQLserver, Oracle, Oracle Financials,
